title: Colors - Australia

metadata.description: Learn about Colors - Australia with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Australian Color Standard
Before 1985, Australians used the British color standard BS 381C.
In 1985 the Australian Independent Colour Standard AS 2700 was created:
Code
Color
B
Blue
G
Green
N
Neutrals (grey)
P
Purple
R
Red
T
Blue/Green
X
Yellow/Red
Y
Yellow
The codes (or names) cannot be used in HTML.
These hex values are non official approximate values intended to simulate AS 2700 colors in HTML:

summary: This tutorial covers Colors - Australia concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Colors - Australia effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples.
